title: Simulation Game-Based Construction Management Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Education to strengthen construction project management competencies using smartphone-based simulation tools

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate competency in process management through construction project scheduling and resource allocation simulations.
Learners can propose at least three risk response strategies under limited budget conditions.
Learners can explain the process of determining construction priorities based on the characteristics of different construction environments (dams/canals).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
